Text: Rainbow Rising for me is the best album ! thanks man

DYZAN59:
It sure is!
Oh, and you're welcome!
Finally, someone who gets it! There's no need to include duplicates of old material from compilation albums. This saves time on deleting unnecessary songs. Thanks bro, I'll be sure to seed. :)
Rising is the magnum opus of Rainbow. Great upload and thanks!

BIG thanks to the up-loader!
+1 from me.
RIP Ronnie James Dio!  Long Live Rock and Roll

Dio's singing, Blackmore's guitar, Daisley's keyboards and Powell's drumming, those were the best times of Rainbow.

Thanks for uploading!
Thanks for the great upload. Great music from an overlooked band. Never enough airplay. Thanks to all seeders, huge file downloaded in less than 30 min!
